name: fexafv2ex
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe), wcel(crn(c0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crn(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(crn(c0), universe), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crn(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(crn(c0), universe), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(crn(c0), universe), wcel(cafv2(c0, c2), universe))

comment: The alternate function value is always a set if the function (resp. the domain of the function) is a set. (Contributed by AV, 3-Sep-2022.)
